english.segment1: I Climb, I Slip, I Fall. Reaching for your hands. But I lay here all alone. Sweating all your blood. If I could find out how. To make you listen now. Because I'm starving for you here. With my undying love and I. ..I will
english.segment2: Breathe for love tomorrow. Cause there's no hope for today. Breathe for love tomorrow. Cause maybe theres another way
english.segment3: I Climb, I Slip, I Fall. Reaching for your hands. But I Lay Here All alone. Sweating all your blood. If I could find out how. To make you listen now. Because I'm starving for you here. With my undying love and I. ..I Will
english.segment4: Breathe for love tomorrow. Cause theres no hope for today. Breathe for love tomorrow. Cause maybe theres another way. [X2]
english.segment5: I Climb, I Slip, I Fall. Into Your Empty hands. but I Lay Here All alone. Sweating all your blood
